definition: to examine oneself/to reflect on one's shortcomings/introspection/self-awareness/self-criticism
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)

sentences.english: To look at ourselves in the mirror often will be very beneficial.
sentences.chinese: 经常照镜自省将让我们受益匪浅。

sentences.english: Experts long believed that autistics lack imagination and introspection.
sentences.chinese: 专家一向认为，自闭症患者缺乏想像及自省。

sentences.english: Unbidden shall it call in the night, that men may wake and gaze upon themselves.
sentences.chinese: 不期然地它要在夜中呼唤，使人们醒起，反躬自省。

sentences.english: An additional benefit to having a model is the capability to introspect it at run time.
sentences.chinese: 拥有模式的其他好处是可以在运行时对其进行自省。

sentences.english: You can't introspect and find them.
sentences.chinese: 你无法通过自省而感受到它们的存在。

sentences.english: This method works equally well for introspection documents.
sentences.chinese: 该方法对自省文档也同样有效。

sentences.english: You really have to look inside yourself and find your own inner strength.
sentences.chinese: 你真的必须反躬自省，寻找自已内心的力量。

sentences.english: For my own shortcomings and introspection, will in the face of a setback to jealousy.
sentences.chinese: 为自己的不足而自省，才会在挫折面前发愤努力。

sentences.english: But often, using inheritance structures together with introspection allows an even greater flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 但通常，将继承结构和自省一起使用会使灵活性更佳。

sentences.english: There will be a lot of soul-searching later this year for advocates of health care reform.
sentences.chinese: 医疗改革的支持者们今年将会要深刻自省。

sentences.english: That kind of self-examination is what you need in order to catalyze personal change and/or improvement.
sentences.chinese: 那些自省是你要做出自我改变和改进所必需的。

sentences.english: The land market in self-examination, it is also the central government to focus on one of the places.
sentences.chinese: 土地市场自省，这也是中央政府把重点放在一个地方。

sentences.english: The class is then introspected for fields that can be exposed as parameters.
sentences.chinese: 该类对于公布为参数的字段是自省的。

sentences.english: It is the continual process of self-review.

definition: to reflect upon oneself/to examine one's conscience/to question oneself/to search one's soul
to reflect upon oneself/introspection
to think back over sth/to review/to revisit/to rethink/reflection/reassessment
to seek the cause in oneself rather than sb else
self-criticism
introspection/to ask oneself
to examine/to cast a critical eye over (especially in the context of introspection)
self-/ego (psychology)
to call upon/to inspect
to preserve a proper behavior in private life
self-discipline/self-regulation/autonomy (ethics)/autonomic (physiology)
to encourage oneself
to examine or inspect/self-criticism/review
self-respect/self-love/self-regard/regard for oneself/to cherish one's good name/to take good care of one's health
words and actions/what one says and what one does
see a worthy, think to imitate (idiom, from Analects); emulate the virtuous/Follow the example of a virtuous and wise teacher.
